member.summary: If set to true, this progress bar will have a striped texture.

member.summary: If set to true, any stripe will be animated.

member.summary: The minimum value represented by the progress bar. This must be less than both and .

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.ProgressBar.MaxValue
member.summary: The maximum value represented by the progress bar. This must be greater than both and .

member.summary: The current value represented by the progress bar. This must fall between and .

member.name: P:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Toast.ShowOnRender
member.summary: Specifies whether to show the toast immediately when rendered without having to separately invoke the method.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Bootstrap.Components.Toast.OnHideAsync
